description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $770.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with The University of Western Ontario. The average
  contract duration was 0.92 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $136.0K. The longest
  contract was 2.18 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $876.3K.
lookup_name: 'THE UNIVERSITY OF WESTERN ONTARIO'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '770.5K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '23'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '4%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-8%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'

s424_mean_duration: '0.92'
s421_mean_contract_value: '136.0K'
s425_max_duration: '2.18'
s422_max_contract_value: '876.3K'
